title: Друзі
overview: "Friends" is an action-packed series about true male friendship, which is able to withstand any obstacles, which even war cannot break. According to the plot, three best friends Serhii, Yarik and Roma decide to surprise their friend, who serves in the Armed Forces, and visit him on the eve of his birthday. This frivolous, gambling idea becomes the beginning of an unpredictable journey from their native Odesa to Mykolaiv, and later through de-occupied villages and right into the epicenter of hostilities, because it turned out that their friend is not serving deep in the rear, but on the front line. Along the way, getting into adventures that become more dangerous with each kilometer, the heroes open deeper and deeper wounds of war and meet people who change them forever.
